vote.title: Authorize acquisition from Hotel Miramar, LLC, of approximately 35,133 square feet of commercially improved land located near the intersection of Fort Worth Avenue and North Plymouth Road for the COVID-19 Supportive Housing Project - Not to exceed $3,518,000.00 ($3,500,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $18,000.00) - Financing: U.S. Department of Treasury - Coronavirus Relief Funds
